thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. FDA Says Medtronic Recalls Certain Types Of Defibrillators

title: BRIEF-U.S. FDA Says Medtronic Recalls Certain Types Of Defibrillators

organizations.name: reuters) - u.s. food and drug administration

text: February 26, 2018 / 8:32 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-U.S. FDA Says Medtronic Recalls Certain Types Of Defibrillators Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 26 (Reuters) - U.S. Food and Drug Administration: * U.S. FDA SAYS MEDTRONIC RECALLS CARDIAC RESYNCHRONIZATION THERAPY AND IMPLANTABLE CARDIOVERTER DEFIBRILLATORS DUE TO MANUFACTURING ERROR * U.S. FDA SAYS RECALLED 48 UNITS IN U.S. OF MEDTRONICâ€˜S CARDIAC RESYNCHRONIZATION THERAPY WITH DEFIBRILLATION AND IMPLANTABLE CARDIOVERT-DEFIBRILLATORS * U.S. FDA SAYS IDENTIFIED MEDTRONIC'S ICDS, CRT-DS RECALL AS A CLASS I RECALL; USE OF THESE DEVICES MAY CAUSE SERIOUS INJURIES OR DEATH Source text: ( bit.ly/2F82rNq ) Further company coverage:
